item.title: YouTube Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
About Us:

We are dedicated to creating engaging and high-quality content for our YouTube audience. We are looking for a talented Video Editor to join our dynamic team.

Job Description:

We are seeking a creative and skilled YouTube Video Editor who can transform raw footage into compelling and visually appealing videos. The ideal candidate will have a keen eye for detail, a passion for storytelling, and the ability to meet deadlines.

Responsibilities:

Edit video content for our YouTube channel, ensuring a high standard of quality and creativity. Collaborate with the content team to understand the vision and goals of each video project.

Incorporate graphics, special effects, music, and sound effects to enhance the final product.

Optimize videos for YouTube, including adding titles, descriptions, and tags.

Stay updated with the latest trends and techniques in video editing and YouTube content creation.

Manage multiple projects simultaneously and deliver videos on schedule.

Requirements:

Proven experience as a Video Editor, preferably with a focus on YouTube content.

Proficiency in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, or similar.

Strong understanding of YouTube platform and best practices for video content.

Excellent storytelling skills and a creative mindset.
Ability to work independently and as part of a team.

Strong communication and organizational skills.
A portfolio showcasing your previous video editing work.

Preferred Qualifications:

Experience with motion graphics and animation.
Knowledge of YouTube analytics and SEO.

Familiarity with social media platforms and video content trends.

What We Offer:

- Competitive salary and flexible working hours.
- Opportunity to work with a passionate and creative team.
- Potential for growth and advancement within the company.
- A fun and supportive work environment.

We look forward to seeing your creativity and skills in action!

Hourly Range: $12.00-$36.00
Posted On: June 20, 2024 12:23 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Audio Editing, Video Post-Editing, Education
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Audio Editing, Video Post-Editing, Education
Country: Spain
click to apply

item.title: Head Of Editing Department - Upwork
item.description:
*Hiring a Head Of Editing Department*

We are hiring a head of editing department for our agency, SNP Enterprises, which is the top 3 biggest content agencies in the world.

You'll be working alongside on some of the top tier clients in the entrepreneurship, business space, and will be able to build a massive portfolio that can serve you for decades.

Some of our clients include: Russell Brunson, David Meltzer, MambaFx, Garrett White, and many others that you'll wanna have in your portfolio.

Requirements:

- We are hiring someone that is top 0,1% in the editing space, someone that is up with the trends, someone that edits like a beast, someone young, hungry, and confident that his edits are brutally good
- Someone that has leadership skills to train our editors to upscale to amazing top tier editing levels
- Experience in the editing space for 3+ years

Scope of work:

- You will be in charge of all editors in the team (15-20 at the moment)
- You will review every single clip that they do
- You will point out improvements, tweaks, and ways to make clips better
- You'll be in charge of following editing trends and following what performs the best
- You'll be in charge of finding assets, websites, and anything needed to take the team to the next level
- You will lead the editing weekly calls where you'll review videos, show them what can be done better
- You will review Loom videos that editors submit, to see if there's anything that can be done in a better or faster manner

YOU WILL NOT edit any videos yourself, this is not a video editor position, it is a leadership training position.

Compensation:

Structure starts of at $1,000 per month

A $500 bonus will be added if KPI's are met in terms of views for our clients.

How To Apply:

1. Send your top 10 edits that you've made
2. Send client names, links to their social media and their best performing videos you've edited
3. Send over a brief summary on why you think you're the right person for this position

Looking forward to it!

Budget: $1,500
Posted On: June 20, 2024 12:20 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:CapCut, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Social Media Video, Video Editing, Content Creation, Video Editing & Production
Skills: CapCut, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Social Media Video, Video Editing, Content Creation, Video Editing & Production
Country: Serbia
click to apply

item.title: Short form video editor needed for project ASAP! - Upwork
item.description:
Hi editors!

I have a video that needs editing in the next 24 hours or so.

My client is a fitness coach, and he has recorded a voiceover of him giving some fitness advice, and he's also provided a bunch of b roll clips of my client working out etc.

We're looking for an editor to take the voiceover, cut out any mistakes, gaps etc... and then put the engaging clips over the top and add engaging captions.

The budget for this video is $6.

If this goes well, there's likely to be similar work in the future.

Will be hiring soon!

Thanks,
Alvie


Posted On: June 20, 2024 12:14 UTC

item.title: Video Animator and Visual Effects Specialist - Upwork
item.description:
We are a premium raw food nutrition for dogs and cats specialising in wild and free ranged produce.
Website: www.rogueraw.com.au
We're seeking serious KNOCKOUT TALENT, in creative Video Animator and Visual Effects Specialist to produce two visually striking short videos for our brand RogueRaw (refer to Brand Strategy attached for design guides) . Here's the two videos we want re-worked ( these videos are roughs but this is the footage we will use)
.
https://youtu.be/qg7pHxwbgAw
https://youtu.be/kkVyY0pjOl8

Your role will be to deliver the visual effect and stock video content using animation and special effects. The video should captivate and engage the audience, leaving a lasting impression.
    Required Skills:
    - Proficiency in video editing software such as Adobe After Effects or similar
    - Strong understanding of animation principles and techniques
    - Ability to create and integrate special effects seamlessly
    - Knowledge of stock video content and how to enhance its visual appeal
    - Attention to detail and ability to bring creative ideas to life
    - Excellent communication and collaboration skills
    
If you have a creative flair and are passionate about delivering high-quality videos that leave a lasting impact, we would love to hear from you!

Please provides samples of work that showcases your abilities.

Hourly Range: $24.00-$42.00

Category: Visual Effects
Skills:Adobe After Effects, Motion Graphics, 2D Animation, Animation, Video Editing
Skills: Adobe After Effects, Motion Graphics, 2D Animation, Animation, Video Editing

item.title: Video Editor for Luxury Female Activewear Brand - TikTok & Instagram Reels - Upwork
item.description:
Job Description:

Are you a creative and skilled video editor with experience in fashion reels? We are looking for a talented individual to join our team and help us create captivating video content for our TikTok and Instagram ad campaigns, with the potential for a long-term working relationship.

About Us:

We are Antheia, a luxury activewear brand that merges elegance with high-performance functionality. Our ethos revolves around sustainability, ethical practices, and empowering women. We are a self-made brand, designing our own clothes and standing firmly against fast fashion. Our items are timeless and clean, providing our customers with sophisticated designs, clean lines, and neutral tones that seamlessly blend luxury and performance.

What We Offer:

We provide a wealth of HDR iPhone footage and Sony camera raw footage, ready for you to transform into engaging and dynamic TikTok and Instagram reels. Our goal is to create multiple reels with different hooks and songs to test on these platforms, aiming to attract and captivate our target audience. We will also provide some example videos; some will need creative copywriting within the ads, while others will simply feature pretty models posing.

Your Responsibilities:

Edit provided footage into high-quality TikTok and Instagram reels that align with our brand’s aesthetic and ethos.
Experiment with different hooks and songs to create multiple versions of each reel.
Showcase our unique selling points, such as our commitment to sustainability, ethical practices, and the luxurious quality of our neutral-toned activewear.
Highlight that we are a self-made brand designing our own clothes, and our stance against fast fashion with timeless, clean items.
Collaborate with our team to ensure the final product aligns with our brand vision.
Capture the quiet luxury and clean girl aesthetic, inspired by brands like AIM'N Sportswear, Crop Shop Boutique, Meshki, House of CB, Dore and Rose, Aestec, and Ninepine.
Produce both aesthetic model videos and explanatory videos with text, highlighting our unique selling points and selling based on emotion.
Conduct market research, analyze the Meta ad library, and explore our website (www.antheiafit.com) to create the best possible videos.
Provide creative input and suggestions to enhance the overall content.
Ensure the videos maintain an elegant, clean, and easy-to-understand vibe that matches our website and brand.
What We’re Looking For:

Proven experience in video editing, especially for fashion brands.
A strong portfolio showcasing your previous work, particularly for social media platforms like TikTok and Instagram.
Creativity and attention to detail, with an eye for what’s trending in the fashion and activewear industry.
Ability to work with HDR iPhone footage and Sony camera raw footage.
Good creative input and the ability to suggest innovative ideas.
A modern, sophisticated approach to video editing.
Willingness to potentially work with us long-term.
How to Apply:

Submit your portfolio highlighting your previous work for fashion brands, especially any reels or TikTok/Instagram videos you have created.
Edit the provided footage into a short reel (15-30 seconds) to showcase your skills and understanding of our brand. This will be a crucial part of the selection process.
Provide a brief explanation of your creative process and how you approach editing fashion reels.
We are excited to see what you can bring to our brand and look forward to working with a creative mind who shares our passion for luxury activewear and sustainability. Join us in creating stunning visual content that resonates with our audience and showcases the essence of Antheia.

PS: Every video that starts with TikTok, is our clothing. We really like how Dore & Rose did their text video's, you can also look at aestec and get inspiration how we can make these professional video's and bring out our clean girl aesthetic vibe in them.



Posted On: June 20, 2024 11:38 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing
Skills: Video Editing
Country: Hong Kong
click to apply

Capture the quiet luxury and clean girl aesthetic, inspired by brands like AIM'N Sportswear, Crop Shop Boutique, Meshki, House of CB, Dore and Rose, Aestec, and Ninepine.
Produce both aesthetic model videos and explanatory videos with text, highlighting our unique selling points and selling based on emotion.
Conduct market research, analyze the Meta ad library, and explore our website (www.antheiafit.com) to create the best possible videos.
Provide creative input and suggestions to enhance the overall content.
Ensure the videos maintain an elegant, clean, and easy-to-understand vibe that matches our website and brand.
What We’re Looking For:

Proven experience in video editing, especially for fashion brands.
A strong portfolio showcasing your previous work, particularly for social media platforms like TikTok and Instagram.
Creativity and attention to detail, with an eye for what’s trending in the fashion and activewear industry.
Ability to work with HDR iPhone footage and Sony camera raw footage.
Good creative input and the ability to suggest innovative ideas.
A modern, sophisticated approach to video editing.
Willingness to potentially work with us long-term.
How to Apply:

Submit your portfolio highlighting your previous work for fashion brands, especially any reels or TikTok/Instagram videos you have created.
Edit the provided footage into a short reel (15-30 seconds) to showcase your skills and understanding of our brand. This will be a crucial part of the selection process.
Provide a brief explanation of your creative process and how you approach editing fashion reels.
We are excited to see what you can bring to our brand and look forward to working with a creative mind who shares our passion for luxury activewear and sustainability. Join us in creating stunning visual content that resonates with our audience and showcases the essence of Antheia.

PS: Every video that starts with TikTok, is our clothing. We really like how Dore & Rose did their text video's, you can also look at aestec and get inspiration how we can make these professional video's and bring out our clean girl aesthetic vibe in them.



Posted On: June 20, 2024 11:38 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing
Skills: Video Editing
Country: Hong Kong
click to apply

item.title: TikTok / YouTube Shorts Editor - Upwork
item.description:
Shortify Media is an agency specialising in making short TikTok / YouTube Shorts videos for clients.

We are looking for a person who can use capcut or an editing software, who knows how to use tiktok and what is trendy right now.

We need 30 videos per month. You will get a long video from YouTube and you will have to cut it down into shorts. You will need to make the captions and make if fun and entertaining. Adding sound effects, emojis, coloring the captions, overlays and so on. Our budget as stated is $150 per 30 shorts.

To be sure that you have read the description please include the word "sticks" in your reply.

If we like you we will hire you for long term and pay bonuses. Also it's a bonus if you have already done this and have some examples.

Budget: $150
Posted On: June 20, 2024 11:37 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, TikTok, Adobe Premiere Pro
Skills: Video Editing, TikTok, Adobe Premiere Pro
Country: Bulgaria

item.title: Video Creator - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled video creator to help us produce an engaging and visually stunning video for our organization. The project will involve the following key components:

3D Logo Animation:

Transform our existing 2D logo into a 3D format.
Ensure the 3D logo is dynamic and engaging.
Leadership Circular Animation:

Highlight six key features of our school within a circular design.
Each feature will be represented in its own gear, with all gears rendered in 3D.
The gears should be interconnected, creating a cohesive and fluid visual story.
We will provide:

The 2D logo for reference.
A sample video for style and quality guidance.
The final video should tell a seamless story, connecting each feature in a visually appealing and logical manner.

Requirements:

Proven experience in 3D animation and video creation.
Strong portfolio showcasing similar projects.
Ability to meet deadlines and communicate effectively.
Please provide your portfolio and a brief description of your approach to this project. We look forward to working with a creative and dedicated professional to bring our vision to life.

Budget: $10
Posted On: June 20, 2024 11:34 UTC
Category: Motion Graphics
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Explainer Video, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Explainer Video, Video Production
Country: India
click to apply

item.title: Videographer for interview recording in Manhattan, NY - Upwork
item.description:
Videographer to record an interview in Manhattan, NY.

Location: Manhattan, NY.

Time/Date: Thursday, July 18, 2024

Job length: 3.5 hours

Required time on site is approximately 1 hour. (Setup, interview, breakdown)

Interview will be approximately 1 to 1 1/2 hours.

Setup:

We will work with a remote setup: the interviewer will conduct the interview via Zoom (no need to record that), and the local videographer will record the presenter/speaker we are interviewing.

Ideally 1 person crew with 2 cameras experienced in recording interviews (light/right framing/sound recording with mounted boom or lav).

Tech:

Required quality: 4:2:2 10 bit HD or 4K (A7Siii or FX6 like quality), or better.

Some fun B-Roll footage as well.

Video will be used to create a video demo reel for the speaker.

Output:

RAW footage

Note: No editing required, just provide raw footage.

Hope to hear from you!

If you have some samples of interviews or presentations you’ve done before, that would be great!

Here’s an example of what we’re looking for as an output: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1Thtu1H002dII1lduIU6bozu_RvAwegmd/view?usp=drive_link

Hourly Range: $80.00-$120.00
Posted On: June 20, 2024 11:27 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:Videography
Skills: Videography
Country: Canada
click to apply

item.title: Video and Podcast Editor for Real Estate Company - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled video and podcast editor to join our real estate company. As a video and podcast editor, you will be responsible for editing and enhancing our video and podcast content to create engaging and professional material for our audience. The ideal candidate should have experience in video editing software and be familiar with podcast editing techniques. Attention to detail and the ability to meet deadlines is crucial.

  Responsibilities:
  - Edit and enhance video and podcast content
  - Add graphics, music, and other effects
  - Ensure high-quality audio and video output

  Requirements:
  - Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Final Cut Pro, Adobe Premiere Pro)
  - Experience in podcast editing
  - Strong attention to detail
  - Ability to meet deadlines

  Join our dynamic real estate team and contribute to our success by creating visually appealing and engaging content. This is a great opportunity for someone passionate about real estate and looking to showcase their editing skills.

Hourly Range: $4.00-$10.00
Posted On: June 20, 2024 11:26 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Audio Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Audio Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production
Country: ESP

item.title: YouTube Video Editor for a Travel Channel - Upwork
item.description:
Looking for a video editor for a Travel vlog on YouTube, for a young channel with just over 4k subscribers.
The videos length is usually between 15 to 20 mins - depending on the video's storyline.
We use FCP and ideally you would use the same app.
We are looking to release 1 video per week consistently and maybe more in the future.
There is a potential to increase the scope for short content editing in the future.
Looking for a good editor with a fixed stated budget at first, but can increase as the channel grows in the future.
Looking for a long-term cooperation here and not a one-time editing.

Budget: $75
Posted On: June 20, 2024 11:22 UTC
Category: Video Editing

item.title: YouTube Shorts Creator and Editor - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for talented YouTube Shorts creators who can use AI technology to generate engaging videos. As a creator, you will be responsible for coming up with creative ideas and directions for the content. You should also have the skills to edit the AI-generated videos to ensure high-quality production. This role requires a strong understanding of YouTube Shorts and its audience, as well as proficiency in using AI tools. The ability to work independently and meet tight deadlines is crucial. Join our team and be a part of the rapidly growing YouTube Shorts community!
